description: Stylesheet for theme management and layout of the App component in a tic-tac-toe application, defining color variables for light and dark themes, and styles for various elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container class for the application that centers content and manages background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class for the logo with size constraints and potential animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for layout with flexbox, responsible for centering content.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class used for styling links within the App component.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling the application's theme, styled with transition effects.
